compat-change.description: Apps targeting {@code Build.VERSION_CODES.S} or higher need {@link android.Manifest.permission#STATUS_BAR} permission to collapse the status bar panels due to security reasons. This was being exploited by malware to prevent the user from accessing critical notifications.
compat-change.name: LOCK_DOWN_COLLAPSE_STATUS_BAR

compat-change.description: In apps targeting {@link android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES#TIRAMISU} or higher, calling {@link android.service.quicksettings.TileService#requestListeningState} will check that the calling package (uid) and the package of the target {@link android.content.ComponentName} match. It'll also make sure that the context used can take actions on behalf of the current user.
compat-change.name: REQUEST_LISTENING_MUST_MATCH_PACKAGE
